eu.itesla_project.iidm.network

Interface StateManager


  • public interface StateManager
    This class provides methods to manage states of the network (create and remove a state, set the working state, etc).
    Author:
    Geoffroy Jamgotchian

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String INITIAL_STATE_ID
      A constant for the id of the initial state (the one created by default)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allowStateMultiThreadAccess(boolean allow)
      Allows states to be accessed simulaneously by different threads.
      void cloneState(String sourceStateId, List<String> targetStateIds)
      Create a new state by cloning an existing one.
      void cloneState(String sourceStateId, String targetStateId)
      Create a new state by cloning an existing one.
      Collection<String> getStateIds()
      Get the state id list.
      String getWorkingStateId()
      Get the working state.
      boolean isStateMultiThreadAccessAllowed() 
      void removeState(String stateId)
      Remove a state.
      void setWorkingState(String stateId)
      Set the working state.

      • getStateIds

        Collection<String> getStateIds()

      • getWorkingStateId

        String getWorkingStateId()
        Get the working state.
        Returns:
        the id of the working state

      • setWorkingState

        void setWorkingState(String stateId)
        Set the working state.
        Parameters:
        stateId - the id of the working state
        Throws:
        eu.itesla_project.commons.ITeslaException - if the state is not found

      • cloneState

        void cloneState(String sourceStateId,
                List<String> targetStateIds)
        Create a new state by cloning an existing one.
        Parameters:
        sourceStateId - the source state id
        targetStateIds - the target state id list (the ones that will be created)
        Throws:
        eu.itesla_project.commons.ITeslaException - if the source state is not found or if a state with an id of targetStateIds already exists

      • cloneState

        void cloneState(String sourceStateId,
                String targetStateId)
        Create a new state by cloning an existing one.
        Parameters:
        sourceStateId - the source state id
        targetStateId - the target state id (the one that will be created)
        Throws:
        eu.itesla_project.commons.ITeslaException - if the source state is not found or if a state with the id targetStateId already exists

      • removeState

        void removeState(String stateId)
        Remove a state.
        Parameters:
        stateId - the id of the state to remove

      • allowStateMultiThreadAccess

        void allowStateMultiThreadAccess(boolean allow)
        Allows states to be accessed simulaneously by different threads. When this options is activated, the working state can have a different value for each thread.
        Parameters:
        allow -

      • isStateMultiThreadAccessAllowed

        boolean isStateMultiThreadAccessAllowed()
